long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser extension to record your interactions with websites to help you generate and maintain SWATHub operation steps. Together with SWATHub Designer desktop application, you can:
* Record web actions such as click and type into SWATHub operation steps.
* Pause and resume web recording procedures to provide design flexibility.
* Support both Chrome and Firefox browsers.

Please refer to https://swathub.com/docs/#/en/privacy for our privacy policy.
